summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Developer with 9+ years of expertise in enterprise software architecture and distributed systems. Specialized in high-performance, scalable backend solutions with a focus on microservices architecture and cloud-native development. Core competencies include:

• Technical Leadership: Led backend architecture decisions and mentored development teams
• Java Expertise: Advanced Spring ecosystem (Boot, Cloud, Data, Security) implementation
• Microservices: Designed and implemented distributed systems handling millions of transactions
• Database Engineering: Deep expertise in SQL/NoSQL databases, performance optimization
• System Integration: Enterprise integration patterns, message brokers, and API design
• Cloud & DevOps: Container orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud infrastructure
• Performance Optimization: Scalability solutions and high-availability architectures
• Backend Security: OAuth2, JWT implementation, API security, encryption

Key Achievements:
• Architected payment processing platform handling $100M+ annual transactions
• Reduced system response time by 45% through microservices implementation
• Achieved 99.99% uptime for critical backend services
• Implemented PCI-DSS compliant payment processing systems
